data.name: H-Hour: World's Elite - Custom Workshop Maps
data.detailed_description:
This is a free DLC pack created from the best submissions of custom workshop maps in our curated Workshop.

We have a strong community of mappers who are pleased to offer free custom maps for use by H-Hour: World's Elite players. In recognition of the quality content created by our custom mappers, we are offering this free DLC pack to all who own our game. The community custom map pack will contain content ranging from original maps to re-creations of old but beloved SOCOM maps. The DLC will be updated in line with our patch releases to provide everyone with the latest map updates and new content.

Enjoy!

data.short_description: This is a free DLC pack created from the best submissions of custom workshop maps in our curated Workshop. The H-Hour community mappers rock!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, 8 or 8.1, 10 -- 64 bit version
  • Processor: 2.6+ Ghz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia: GTX 660 Ti, 760, 950, 1050 / ATI: HD 7850, R9 270, R9 270X, R7 370, RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: KB/M and Controller: PS4, XBox and Steam Go (mobile): 970, 1060 / Mobility: RX570
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, 8 or 8.1, 10 -- 64 bit version
  • Processor: 3.0+ Ghz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia: GTX 590, GTX 680, GTX 770 / ATI: HD 6990, HD 7970, R9 280X, R9 380, R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Go (mobile): 980, 1070

data.legal_notice: This content is owned by the original creators and individual maps and content is not to be copied or reused for other projects without their permission.  The creators may also request removal of their map at any time.  Downloading the DLC does not provide any ownership rights to players themselves. Content will be added, updated and removed through our patch process as maps are approved or removals requested.
